extensionDescription.message: Add quotation marks around text blocks or words and sentences: Select the range you want to quote and press the toolbar button.

infoUsageBlock.message:
Block quotes

  • Set the focus (text cursor) in a multiline text field (<textarea>) of any web page.
  • Select the lines you want to quote. If you only want to quote a single line, you don't need to mark any text, just set the cursor to any position within this line. In case you want to mark several lines, just select (highlight) the text range. The start and end of the selection can be on any position within the first and last line - no need te select full lines.
  • Now press [Ctrl]+[E] (onm Chrome: [Alt]+[B]) or - depending on the default action configured - click the QuoteMe icon in the toolbar.

infoUsageInline.message:
Inline quotes

  • Set the focus (text cursor) in a text field (<input> or <textarea>) of any web page.
  • Select the text range you want to quote. If you only want to quote a single word, you don't need to mark any text, just set the cursor to any position within this word.
  • Now press [Alt]+[M] or - depending on the default action configured - click the QuoteMe icon in the toolbar.

infoQuoteSet.message: The default version is the predefined short ASCII set; long ASCII adds more dashes. The Unicode sets use combinations of Box-drawing characters while E-Mail adds > to the text block and a literal Quote at the start.

infoQuoteStart.message: This full line is inserted right before the to-be quoted text.

infoQuoteBlock.message: These characters are added to each line of the to-be quoted text.

infoQuoteStopp.message: This full line inserted right after the to-be quoted text.

infoQuoteClean.message: Clean trailing whitespace characters in each quoted line.

infoQuotePrev.message: The opening quotation mark is used at the beginning of the inline quotation.

infoQuotePost.message: The closing quotation mark is at the end of the inline quotation.

infoQuoteSave.message: Please note that any changes to the configuration only takes effect if you press the 'Save' button.

noTextareaWarning.message: Set cursor into a multiline text area and mark the lines that should be quoted.

noTextInputWarning.message: Set cursor into a text input field and mark the text that should be quoted.

actionInfo.message: Action to be taken when clicking the QuoteMe icon in the toolbar.
